name: Give Donation Grid Addon
author: Feroz Jaffer

sections.description:
Show Give Donation campaigns as pinterest like grids.

Features:

Pro Version Features
* Save Give forms under post categories. * Show/Hide Goal and Amount raised on the grids. * Show/Hide form summary on the grids. * Shortcode to show category wise donation forms as grid. * Add gallery to each donation forms. * Style Lables and buttons. * Add Campaign end date feature. * Show/Hide Campaign end date on donation form grids. * Show Campaign end countdown feature on signle donation form. * Hide donate button from closed campaigns.

Pro version Demo – http://www.wooaddons.net/give-grid-and-gallery/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download and install the plugin from WordPress dashboard. You can also upload the entire “Give Donation Grid Addon” folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Under ‘Give Donation’ menu you will see new tab called ‘Give Gird’.
  4. Click ‘Give Grid’ tab to configure number of columns.
  5. Use [give_grid_pinterest] shortcode on post or pages.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin tested and work with Give Donation Plugin

Yes.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
